title: SMNTY Classics: Scream Queens
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Scream Queens
description:
For every Michael Myers, there is a Laurie Strode. In this classic, Anney and Samantha uncover the history and evolution of the Scream Queen, the connection to the final girl trope, and shine light on some iconic examples. And then Anney talks about Scream for a long time.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
For every Michael Myers, there is a Laurie Strode. In this classic, Anney and Samantha uncover the history and evolution of the Scream Queen, the connection to the final girl trope, and shine light on some iconic examples. And then Anney talks about Scream for a long time.

itunes:keywords: stuff mom never told you, momstuff, mom stuff, anney reese, smnty, feminism, feminist, activism, social justice, samantha mcvey, horror movies, feminist movies, scream queens, scream, scream neve campbell, jamie lee curtis
